titles.title: Taste And See That The Lord Is Good

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Taste and see that the Lord is ,
Oh taste and see that the Lord is good.
Blessed is the man that trustest in Him,
And blessed is the man trustest in Him.
Oh taste and see that the Lord is good,
Oh taste and see that the Lord is good,
He is good,
He is good.
